data.text: In my inner being I am stirred by a beautiful message
O King, you are the most handsome man in the world,
You who are a mighty warrior, put on your sword!
Ride on like a great chief
The kingdom [MTY] that God will give to you will remain forever.
The perfume of various spices is on your robes.
Among the women who stay near you [EUP] stay are daughters of other kings.
Now I will say something to your bride:
The people from Tyre city will bring gifts to you;
O king, your bride will be entering the palace
While she is wearing a gown that has many colors,
They will be very joyful [DOU] as they are led along
Some day, your sons and your grandsons will become kings,
And as for me, I will enable people in every generation to remember the great things that you [MTY] have done,
